mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, NICKNAME, CONTENTS, WRITE_DATE, EMOTICON, RECOMMEND_CNT, PROFILE_IMAGE, REPLY_PNO ) VALUES( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardType}, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{nickName}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{emoticon}, #{recommendCnt}, #{profileImage}, #{replyPno} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.reply_no as parent_reply_no, A.contents as parent_comment, A.write_date as parent_write_date, A.member_no AS parent_member_no, A.NICKNAME AS parent_nickname, A.profile_image AS parent_image, A.EMOTICON AS parent_emoticon, B.reply_pno as child_reply_pno, B.reply_no as child_reply_no, B.contents as child_comment, B.WRITE_DATE as child_WRITE_date, B.member_no AS child_member_no, B.nickname as child_nickname, B.profile_image AS child_image, B.EMOTICON AS child_emoticon FROM REPLY A LEFT JOIN REPLY B ON A.reply_no = B.reply_pno AND A.board_type = #{type} WHERE A.board_no = #{bno} AND A.reply_pno IS NULL ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE asc, child_WRITE_date asc
